duties_responsibilities.duty: Install and qualify new process equipment and troubleshoot day-to-day manufacturing issues on the production line
Design and execute planned process experiments, collect and analyze data, and report experimental results
Provide training to engineering technicians and production associates
Identify and implement yield and product performance improvement
Develop and maintain process control plans
Adhere to all safety procedures and good housekeeping standards

education_certification.credential: Associate's Degree in engineering or similar technical discipline combined with 3 or more years of First Solar technical experience, or 6 or more years of technical work experience in a Manufacturing setting. Bachelor’s Degree, Master’s Degree, or Ph.D. in an engineering or similar technical discipline with no experience required
